name: gettraining
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dream_diffusion.
Tool description: Train Stable Diffusion models in 8 minutes and generate custom images.
API description: Fetches the training status based on the given training UUID and API keys.

x_api_key.description: API key for the Dream Diffusion service.

training_uuid.description: Unique identifier of the training whose status is being queried.
